title: Savings
detail: WMCS offers several accounts and deposit schemes with attractive interest rates and flexible options. Our account types are tailor-made and facilitate the needs of everyone. Open account of your choice, get competitive interest rates, and operate your deposits safely and smoothly.

title: Loan
detail: We offer different types of loans including  Business Loan Hire-purchase Loan , Education Loan , Special Project Financing , Loan against Fixed Deposit. Our term loans are competitive in interest rates, offer smooth procedure, and provides support through all channels with affordable administrative fee.

title: Remittance
detail: We Deal Remittance from any part of world. Modern Money Express , City Express Money Transfer ,  Prabhu Money Transfer, IME Limited , MoneyGram , IME Group

title: Card
detail: We provice you IME Remittance card. IME card makes you easier and faster to take money.
